story:
*See Russian text below/ Cм. текст на русском ниже

About Manana Youth Center and the Manana Animation Studio

The Manana Animation Studio is an award-winning studio that provides youth with high-quality training in the production of animated films and cartoons. It is part of Manana Youth Center, a cutting-edge multimedia training organization that works to develop the intellectual and creative talents of young people between the ages of 7-16 in Armenia. The Manana Youth Center was founded in 1995, and seeks to create an environment for the overall creative and intellectual development of children. Students are educated as artists and critical thinkers, and through classes at Manana Youth Center, they become socially minded citizens speaking for their generation. 

The Sand Animals film series

The Sand Animals project embodies Manana Youth Center’s mission of providing youth with quality educational programming in art, new media and technology.

The Sand Animals has two primary goals:

  1. Produce a visually engaging education tool to teach children the Armenian alphabet.

  2. Teach Manana Youth Center’s students to create animated films.

Manana’s animation students will storyboard each Sand Animals episode, create the animations, and edit the short films. Through this process, they will become adept at sand animation techniques. Each episode will be around 40 seconds, and will introduce children to a different letter of the Armenian alphabet and to different kinds of animals. 

Manana Animation Studio students are currently working on the first episode, which introduces viewers to the letter " Ա ա " (A a) of the Armenian alphabet, and to the animal "ԱՐՋ" ("Arj", which means "bear"). 

Stills from the first episode: 

ԱՐՋ (Arj=Bear)

The Impact

The educational impact of the Sand Animals is two-fold: teach children the Armenian alphabet, and teach Manana Youth Center's students to create animated shorts! 

With the Sand Animals, Manana Youth Center’s students will promote the rich heritage of the Armenian language through modern media.

The finished project will be distributed widely. The Sand Animals will be placed in libraries and schools throughout Armenia, will be given to TV channels for broadcasting, and will be distributed to Armenian pre-schools, kindergartens and elementary schools in the diaspora.

The Sand Animals will be a valuable resource for children both within and outside of Armenia.

 

Manana Animation Studio students practice sand animation techniques. 

What Your Contribution Will Fund

Your support of the Sand Animals film series will go towards: 

  • Camera upgrades and 2 computers that will allow our students to produce a finished project at the highest possible quality.
  • New animation software to replace outdated programs.
  • Studio lights for use in the production of the Sand Animals. 
  • Pre-production materials for scripting, storyboarding, and the creation of characters for the Sand Animals.
  • Creating Sand Animals DVDs for distribution upon completion of the project.

If we don't reach our funding goal, we will make as many episodes as possible, while applying for other sources of financial support to complete the Sand Animals.

The Paros Foundation, a U.S. based 501(c)(3) certified nonprofit that develops high quality high integrity non-governmental organizations in Armenia, is acting as the fiscal sponsor for this campaign. 

If you can't contribute financially to the Sand Animals...

You can still help by spreading the word and increasing the campaign's visibility! 

  • Share the project with friends and family who may be interested in the campaign. 
  • Share with anyone interested in youth and/or arts education, animation, or Armenia.
  • Post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+, and other social media platforms. 

All of these actions will go a long way to making the Sand Animals campaign a success!

 

Special thanks for Manana Films for creating the video for this project. 

Sand Animals is created for kids, by kids. 

Thank you for your support!

__________________________________________________________________

Про детско-юношеский культурно-образовательный центр Манана и анимационую студию Манана

Анимационная студия Манана обеспечивает детей и юношей высококачественным обучением в производстве анимационных фильмов и мультфилмов. Она является частью детско-юношеского культурно-образовательного центра Манана, современной мультимедийной обучающей организации, работающей на развитие интеллектуальных и творческих способностей молодых людей в возрасте от 7-16 в Армении. Центр Манана был основан в 1995 году и направлен на создание условий для общего творческого и интеллектуального развития детей. Наши студенты обучаются как творческие люди с критичным мышлением, а так же как социально активные граждане, которые будут представлять свое поколение. 

Песочные Животные

Проект “Песочные Животные” соответствует миссии центра Манана, состоящей в том, чтобы обеспечить детей и юношей качественными образовательными программами в сфере искусства, новейших технологии и новых медия.

 Проект “Песочные Животные” имеет две основные цели:

  1. 1.     Произвести визуально-привлекательный образовательный инструмент для обучения детей армянскому языку.
  2. 2.     Научить студентов центра Манана создавать анимационные фильмы.

 

Студенты анимационной студии Манана сделают раскадровку каждого эпизода “Песочных Животных”, создадут анимации и смонтируют их. Благодаря этому процессу они получат большой опыт по части методов песочной анимации. Каждый эпизод будет длиться около 40 секунд и будет знакомить детей с разными буквами армянского алфавита и различных видов животных.

Студенты анимационной студии Манана сейчас работают над первым эпизодом, котороый знакомит зрителей с буквой " Ա ա " (А а) армянского алфавита и с животным "ԱՐՋ" («Ардж», что означает «медведь»).

Кадры из первого эпизода: 

ԱՐՋ (Ардж - медведь)

Влияние

Учебное воздействие “Песочных Животных” имеет два направления: научить детей армянскому алфавиту, и научить студентов центра Манана создавать короткие анимации!

С помощью “Песочных Животных” студенты центра Манана смогутг передать новому поколению богатое наследство армянского языка с помощью новых медия.

Готовый проект будет широко распространен. “Песочные Животные” можно будет найти в библиотеках и школах, дошкольных учереждениях и детских садах как в Армении, так и в диаспоре. Мы также отдадим фильмы телевизионным каналам для вещания.

“Песочные Животные”будут ценным образовательным ресурсом для детей и в Армении, и за ее пределами.

Ваш вклад будет финансировать:

  • Обновления камер и 2 компютера, которые позволят нашим студентам реализовать проект в высшем качестве.
  • Новое програмное обеспечение, чтобы заменить устаревшие программы.
  • Студийный свет для производственного процесса “Песочных Животных”.
  • Материалы для написания сценариев, раскадровок и создания персонажей “Песочных Животных”.
  • Издание DVD-дисков Песочных Животных для рассылки по завершении проекта.

Если мы не достигнем нашей цели с помощью этой кампании, мы снимем столько эпизодов, сколько возможно, одновремменно обращаясь к другим источникам финансовой поддержки, чтобы завершить проект.

Если вы не можете помочь “Песочным Животным” материально...

Вы все еще можете оказать содействие - распространяя проект!

  • Поделитесь информацией о проекте с друзьями и близкими, которых может заинтересовать наш проект.
  • Расскажите о проекте любому, кто хоть как-то заинтересован в анимации, образовании в области искусств или в Армении в целом.
  • Поделитесь ссылкой на проект в Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+ и других социальных сетях.

 Все эти действия помогут “Песочным Животным” стать успешным проектом!

Отдельное спасибо Manana Films для создания видео для этого проекта.

“Песочные Животные” созданы детьми для детей.

Спасибо за Вашу поддержку!

*See Russian text below/ Cм. текст на русском ниже
About Manana Youth Center and the Manana Animation Studio
The Manana Animation Studio is an award-winning studio that provides youth with high-quality training in the production of animated films and cartoons. It is part of Manana Youth Center, a cutting-edge multimedia training organization that works to develop the intellectual and creative talents of young people between the ages of 7-16 in Armenia. The Manana Youth Center was founded in 1995, and seeks to create an environment for the overall creative and intellectual development of children. Students are educated as artists and critical thinkers, and through classes at Manana Youth Center, they become socially minded citizens speaking for their generation. 
The Sand Animals film series
The Sand Animals project embodies Manana Youth Center’s mission of providing youth with quality educational programming in art, new media and technology.
The Sand Animals has two primary goals:


Produce a visually engaging education tool to teach children the Armenian alphabet.


Teach Manana Youth Center’s students to create animated films.


Manana’s animation students will storyboard each Sand Animals episode, create the animations, and edit the short films. Through this process, they will become adept at sand animation techniques. Each episode will be around 40 seconds, and will introduce children to a different letter of the Armenian alphabet and to different kinds of animals. 
Manana Animation Studio students are currently working on the first episode, which introduces viewers to the letter " Ա ա " (A a) of the Armenian alphabet, and to the animal "ԱՐՋ" ("Arj", which means "bear"). 
Stills from the first episode: 

ԱՐՋ (Arj=Bear)
The Impact
The educational impact of the Sand Animals is two-fold: teach children the Armenian alphabet, and teach Manana Youth Center's students to create animated shorts! 
With the Sand Animals, Manana Youth Center’s students will promote the rich heritage of the Armenian language through modern media.
The finished project will be distributed widely. The Sand Animals will be placed in libraries and schools throughout Armenia, will be given to TV channels for broadcasting, and will be distributed to Armenian pre-schools, kindergartens and elementary schools in the diaspora.
The Sand Animals will be a valuable resource for children both within and outside of Armenia.
 
Manana Animation Studio students practice sand animation techniques. 
What Your Contribution Will Fund


Your support of the Sand Animals film series will go towards: 

Camera upgrades and 2 computers that will allow our students to produce a finished project at the highest possible quality.
New animation software to replace outdated programs.
Studio lights for use in the production of the Sand Animals. 
Pre-production materials for scripting, storyboarding, and the creation of characters for the Sand Animals.
Creating Sand Animals DVDs for distribution upon completion of the project.

If we don't reach our funding goal, we will make as many episodes as possible, while applying for other sources of financial support to complete the Sand Animals.
The Paros Foundation, a U.S. based 501(c)(3) certified nonprofit that develops high quality high integrity non-governmental organizations in Armenia, is acting as the fiscal sponsor for this campaign. 
If you can't contribute financially to the Sand Animals...


You can still help by spreading the word and increasing the campaign's visibility! 

Share the project with friends and family who may be interested in the campaign. 
Share with anyone interested in youth and/or arts education, animation, or Armenia.
Post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+, and other social media platforms. 

All of these actions will go a long way to making the Sand Animals campaign a success!
 
Special thanks for Manana Films for creating the video for this project. 
Sand Animals is created for kids, by kids. 
Thank you for your support!
__________________________________________________________________
Про детско-юношеский культурно-образовательный центр Манана и анимационую студию Манана
Анимационная студия Манана обеспечивает детей и юношей высококачественным обучением в производстве анимационных фильмов и мультфилмов. Она является частью детско-юношеского культурно-образовательного центра Манана, современной мультимедийной обучающей организации, работающей на развитие интеллектуальных и творческих способностей молодых людей в возрасте от 7-16 в Армении. Центр Манана был основан в 1995 году и направлен на создание условий для общего творческого и интеллектуального развития детей. Наши студенты обучаются как творческие люди с критичным мышлением, а так же как социально активные граждане, которые будут представлять свое поколение. 
Песочные Животные
Проект “Песочные Животные” соответствует миссии центра Манана, состоящей в том, чтобы обеспечить детей и юношей качественными образовательными программами в сфере искусства, новейших технологии и новых медия.
 Проект “Песочные Животные” имеет две основные цели:


1.     Произвести визуально-привлекательный образовательный инструмент для обучения детей армянскому языку.


2.     Научить студентов центра Манана создавать анимационные фильмы.

Каждый эпизод будет длиться около 40 секунд и будет знакомить детей с разными буквами армянского алфавита и различных видов животных.
Студенты анимационной студии Манана сейчас работают над первым эпизодом, котороый знакомит зрителей с буквой " Ա ա " (А а) армянского алфавита и с животным "ԱՐՋ" («Ардж», что означает «медведь»).
Кадры из первого эпизода: 

ԱՐՋ (Ардж - медведь)
Влияние
Учебное воздействие “Песочных Животных” имеет два направления: научить детей армянскому алфавиту, и научить студентов центра Манана создавать короткие анимации!
С помощью “Песочных Животных” студенты центра Манана смогутг передать новому поколению богатое наследство армянского языка с помощью новых медия.
Готовый проект будет широко распространен. “Песочные Животные” можно будет найти в библиотеках и школах, дошкольных учереждениях и детских садах как в Армении, так и в диаспоре. Мы также отдадим фильмы телевизионным каналам для вещания.

story:
Living according to your true nature ; Guide to enjoy the pleasure of feeling good and healthy every day and forever. See english traduction in italics

EN GROS

Je suis accompagnante en matière de Santé et de Bien-être. J'ai une formation en herboristerie, en nutrition et une spécialisation en soins énergétiques intuitifs. En approfondissant personnellement dans ces directions, j'ai réalisé que plusieurs facteurs de santé méritaient à être revisités, ce qui m'a permis d'élaborer des outils simples et efficaces pour en venir à trouver l'équilibre et le confort dans notre vie de tous les jours. Ces dernières années, je me suis penchée sur les aspects plus essentiels de la vie, en expérimentant la maternité à travers l'accueil de mes deux  enfants, mais aussi en reconnectant avec ma vraie nature, cheminement qui m'a apporté plusieurs enseignements précieux.  

Je tiens à rédiger un ouvrage où je pourrai transmettre tout ce savoir qui m'habite de manière à ce que le plus de personnes possibles puissent en bénéficier et éventuellement jouir d'un état de bien-être et de santé supérieure, voir permanent. Mon intention première est d'offrir un ouvrage lumineux, imagé et coloré, bienveillant, agréable et inspirant où le lecteur sera amené à considérer les "solutions" plutôt que les aspects nocifs et dégradants de notre environnement dénaturé, tout en étant informé des facteurs de risques de nos habitudes modernes.

 

The project

I'm a catalyst of wealth and well-being. I have a background in herbalism, nutrition, and am an intuitive healer. Deepening in these directions, I realized that many health factors deserve to be revisited, which has allowed me to develop simples and effectives tools to maintain balance and comfort in our daily lives. In recent years, I have looked at the most essentials aspects of life, experiencing motherhood through the welcoming of my two children, but also reconnecting with my true nature, journey that has brought me many valuable lessons.

I want to write a book where I can pass on all the knowledge that live in me so that as many people as possible can benefit and possibly enjoy a state of well-being and greater health, see permanent. My first intention is to provide an illuminated book, colorful, pleasant and inspiring where I'll consider the "solutions" rather than harmful and degrading aspects of our unnatural environment, while being aware of factors risks of our modern habits.

Mon besoin en financement

Toute contribution financière à l'égard de cette merveilleuse ambition que je porte m'aidera à supporter à mon tour tous ceux qui participeront de leurs talents ou services à la naissance de ce livre (révision (1500$?), impression (4000$?!, graphisme (2000$?), promotion/ site internet monétisé (3000$?) et autres imprévus ou ambition (traduction vers l'anglais?). Comme vous pouvez le constater mon besoin dépasse largement les 5000$ demandés, mais étrangement, indiegogo prend seulement 4% du financement reçu si  nous atteignons notre objectif plutôt que 9% si nous ne l'atteignons pas. J'estime que, tout comme moi, il vous est plutôt préférable que votre financement bénéficie le plus possible au projet.

Merci infiniment, j'éprouve une extrême reconnaissance pour votre soutient et votre élan de générosité. Votre apport est extrêmement encourageant et me propulse vers la réalisation de mon projet.

Je tiens profondément à ce projet, c'est un peu un appel du coeur, un passage obligé. J'estime que l'être humain à le droit de jouir d'un bient-être profond et d'être sain de la tête au pied et je m'engage à mettre à sa portée tous les outils efficaces que je connais en la matière. Trop de gens souffrent d'un mal être profond ou d'une condition physique limitative alors qu'il pourrait en être autrement. J'offre des séances d'accompagnement desquels j'ai reçu beaucoup de commentaires positifs. 

 

My need for funding

Any financial contribution towards this wonderful ambition I have will help me to support at my turn all those involved for their talents and services to the birth of this book (review ($ 1500?), Printing ($ 4,000? !, graphics ($ 2000?) Promotion / website monetized ($ 3000?) and other unforeseen or ambition (translation into English?). As you can see my need well over $ 5,000 requested, but strangely, INDIEGOGO takes only 4% of the funding received if we reach our goal rather than 9% if we do not reach. I prefer that your financial support benefits as much as possible the project.

Thank you so much, I feel extreme gratitude for your support and your generosity. Your input is extremely encouraging and propuls me to my goal.

I am deeply attacht to this project, it is a bit of a calling, a must. I believe that the human being has the right to enjoy a deep wellbeing and be healthy from head to foot, and I am committed to share all effective tools that I know in this area. Too many people suffer from a deep malaise or a limiting physical condition when it could be otherwise. I offer coaching sessions where I received a lot of positive feedback.

 

LE PROJET DÉVOILÉ

Au fil du temps, j'ai réalisé que nous avions une idée limitée des facteurs responsables de la santé et que notre façon de gérer celle-ci n'amène pas les résultats espérés, justement parce qu'elle comporte certaines lacunes. Par exemple, au niveau scientifique, il semblerait que nous n'ayons pas encore eu le temps de faire une mise à jour par rapport à des donnés très probantes qui redéfinissent le rôle des micro-organismes si craints, l'importance de l'intégrité de nos muqueuses intestinales ou encore l'impact de nos habitudes de vie modernes, de notre alimentation dénaturée, des polluants environnementaux, pesticides, produits ménagers, etc. 

Et puis comme, à la base tout est énergie, j'aimerais aborder notre vitalité d'un point de vue énergétique en parlant de Taux vibratoire et de médecine quantique. Donc, dans cet ouvrage, à partir de mes connaissances en énergétique, médecine intuitive, nutrition, médecines naturelles et modernes, chinoise, ayurvédique, physique quantique, etc, j'aborderai sous un angle plus global (et marginal?) les principes fondamentaux de la Santé.

Voici une idée première des sujets abordés:  le respect de notre écosystème individuel, la nutrition, la maladie, le système immunitaire et son fonctionnement, les micro-organismes, la flore bactérienne, l'intégrité des muqueuses, Pasteur vs Béchamp, La tonification du terrain vs la vaccination, Les maladies émergentes débilitantes, les maladies infantiles, l'amour et la réalisation de Soi, vivre à partir de sa vraie nature, l'énergétique, le taux vibratoire, les blocages énergétiques, l'impact des pensées négatives et de la visualisation, les alternatives naturelles et la médecine moderne, la respiration, la tonification de son terrain et la purification saine de celui-ci, l'impact des polluants environnementaux et des métaux lourds, et bien davantage.

 

THE PROJECT REVEALED

Over time, I realized that we had a limited understanding of the factors responsibles for health and how we manage it does not bring the desired results, just because it has some shortcomings. For example, at a scientific level, it seems that we have not yet had time to do an update with respectfull data that redefine the role of micro-organisms so feared, the importance of integrity of our intestinal mucosa or the impact of our habits of this modern life, our unnatural diet, environmental pollutants, pesticides, household products, etc..

And as at the basis everything is energy, I would like to address our vitality from the point of view of energy talking vibratory rate and quantum medicine. So in this book, from my knowledge of energy, intuitive medicine, nutrition, natural and modern medicine, Chinese, Ayurvedic, quantum physics, etc., I will discuss in a more global perspective (and marginal?) The fundamental principles of Health.

Here is a first idea of the topics: respect for our individual ecosystem, nutrition, diseases, the immune system and its operation, microorganisms, bacterial flora, mucosal integrity, Pastor vs. Béchamp, The toning field vs. vaccination, debilitating emerging diseases, childhood diseases, love and self-realization, living from our true nature, energy, the vibratory rate, energy blockages, the impact of negative thinking and visualization, natural alternatives, modern medicine, breathing, toning his organism and healthy cleansing of it, the impact of environmental pollutants and heavy metals, and more.

 

LES À CÔTÉ

Le Guide Alimentaire Vivifiant

J'ai réalisé au printemps 2012 une Conférence-Gourmande en lien avec un Guide alimentaire Vivifiant (que j'ai moi-même conçu et que je souhaite distribuer à large échelle éventuellement), celui-ci est un résumé concis du type d'alimentation que nous devrions prôner, en accord avec notre nature, pour nous sentir Vibrants, Vivants, Vivifiés. Un petit tirage (50X) a été effectué de cette première version qui sera modifié de manière à être intégré avec mon Livre.

 

Les conférences

Je souhaite monter une série de conférences WEB en lien avec le livre. Pour l'instant, j'ai l'idée d'en monter 4 qui aborderaient les sujets suivants : 

* De l'intégrité des muqueuses (impact des irritants, gluten et produits laitiers)

* L'alimentation vivifiante (en lilen avec le Guide)

* Maladies, micro-organismes et système immunitaire

* Se purifier sainement et naturellement

 

Le CD et Le coffre à outil

Notez que les investisseurs de plus de 200$ recevront un CD tout spécialement conçu pour eux contenant toutes les conférences WEB réalisées en lien avec le livre. De plus, les "choyés" recevront un coffre à outil interactif et amusant, conçus à partir des donnés du livre.

 

 

 D'actualité

Je vous invites à parcourrir mon Blog pour mieux me connaître et découvrir mes approches : www.herboristesansfrontier.blogspot.com

 

REWARDS

*Please note that all the rewards will be translate in english only if I get enough foundind for it, so thankx for your generosity!!

The vitality Food Guide

I realized in spring 2012, a Gourmet conference in connection with the Vitality Food Guide (which I designed myself and I want to distribute on a large scale somehow), it is a concise summary of the type of food we should eat in accordance with our nature, to feel Vibrant, alive and energize. A small run (50X in french only) was made of the first version to be modified and integrated with my book.

 

conferences

I want to create a series of web conferences in connection with the book. For now, I have the ideas to go for 4 of them, that would address the following topics:

* at the basis of the mucosal integrity (impact of irritants, gluten, dairy products and much more)

* The invigorating diet 

* Diseases, micro-organisms and immune system

* Purify your organism in an healthy way

 

The CD and the tool box

Note that investors of more than $ 200 will receive a CD specially designed for them with all of the WEB conferences held in conjunction with the book. In addition, the "blessed" will receive a fun and interactive tool box, designed from the given book.

 

Here are the categories of the prices you could get

Horsd'oeuvre: 10$

You will receive by mail the Vitality Food Guide and your name will appear on my thank you page.

* Additional fees may be required if you live outside of Canada.
** Delivery Date subject to change as the project

 

The projet : 30$

above + You will receive a printed autographed book. Note that the first printing of the book will be made on a small scale and numbered by hand.

* Additional fees may be required if you live outside of Canada.
** Delivery Date subject to change as the project

 

The multimedia: 100$

above + 1 free web conferencing to choose from, in connection with the book (to come to my site) + 1 VIP invitation for two to the book launch

* Additional fees may be required if you live outside of Canada.
** Delivery Date subject to change as the project

 

Le multimedia plus : 200$

above + free access to all web conferences via a CD.

** Delivery Date subject to change as the project

 

The accompanied : 300$

above + 1 session WEB support group (dates to be determined)

** Delivery Date subject to change as the project

 

The blessed : 500$

the aove + 1 tool box (limited number) in connection with the book + 1 copy of the first version of the Vitality Food Guide (in french only)

 

PREMIER ÉLAN D'ÉCRITURE - INTRODUCTION - 17 Juillet 2013

J'estime que l'être humain a le droit de jouir d'un bien-être profond et d'être sain de la tête au pied et qu’il est maintenant temps pour moi de mettre à votre portée tout le savoir que j’ai acquis pour y parvenir. Trop de gens souffrent d'un mal être profond ou d'une condition physique limitative alors qu'il pourrait en être autrement. 

Au fil du temps, j'ai réalisé que nous avions une idée limitée des facteurs responsables de la santé et que notre façon de gérer celle-ci n'amène pas les résultats espérés, justement parce que les approches, aussi diversifiées soient-elles, bien que la plupart bienveillantes, comportent certaines lacunes. Par exemple, la médecine conventionnelle semble adopter une approche rationnelle qui oublie trop souvent de considérer l’être humain de façon holistique, c’est-à-dire dans son ensemble. La science sur laquelle se fie la médecine moderne n’a pas le temps d’être publiquement mise à jour et donc nous n’en bénéficions pas du à sa juste valeur et bien souvent le savoir acquis qui réussi à se propager semble être biaisé par des intérêts corporatifs. Les approches rationnelles qui s’appuient sur des généralités soumettent l’organisme humain à des paramètres rigides alors que le corps est doté d’un pouvoir d’auto-régulation, voire d’auto-guérison surprenant et qu’il est, somme toute, impermanent, régis par des lois intangibles surprenantes révélant bien souvent du miraculeux, lesquels miracles ne sont pas pris en considération. Les approches corps-esprit, qui reconnaissent l’impact de l’esprit sur l’harmonie du corps physique, comportent elles aussi leur lacunes, ne serait-ce qu’en nourrissant un sentiment de culpabilité chez l’être malade en axant sur la responsabilité de son vécu, ce qui a pour effet généralement d’amplifier le mal-être. Toutes ses approches pourtant ont ceci en commun, c’est qu’elles cherchent réellement à améliorer les conditions de santé et physiques de ceux qui en ont besoin, leur approche est généralement bienveillante, au mieux de leurs capacités et connaissances. Je ne prétendrai pas non plus détenir La Solution idéale, mais je sens que je suis parvenue à créer pour moi une médecine efficace et globale et je tiens à vous partager mes connaissances et apprentissages en la matière.

Mon intérêt personnel envers l’art de la guérison et d’accompagner les gens vers un état de mieux-être m’a amené à approfondir mes connaissances au sein de la médecine quantique, du cheminement personnel, de l’énergétique et de ma connexion intuitive. J’ai alors constaté que bien que plusieurs concepts portent un nom différent, selon l’auteur, il y a des éléments de bases qui reviennent et qui pourraient entre-autre être qualifiées de vérités supérieures (à ne pas confondre avec absolues). J’ai entre-autre découvert que bonheur et santé allaient de pair et qu’il suffisait de jouir d’un état supérieur de bonheur, voire permanent, pour que notre état de santé retrouve son optimal, peu importe notre âge ou notre condition physique. Comment est-ce possible ? Ou encore comment jouir d’un état de bonheur permanent ? Et bien c’est cela que je vais tenter de démystifier avec vous au travers des pages suivantes. 

 

14 août - Voici la structure de ce qui a été réalisé jusqu'à maintenant au niveau de l'écriture

 

VIVRE AU NATUREL


L’IMPACT DE NOS PENSÉES SUR NOTRE BIEN-ÊTRE        

Le corps pensant 

Le corps mouvant   

La cellule intelligente et l’impact de nos croyances         

L’intelligence suprême       

Des vibrations qui guérissent     

    

MIEUX COMPRENDRE LES ENJEUX DE LA MALADIE      

Les micro-organismes et leur rôle d’équilibre       

Les micro-organismes et leur fonction de coopération                         

Qu’est-ce donc qui favorise la maladie ?                     

Une autre façon de voir ce qui favorise la maladie       

L’importance de vivre la maladie     

Et la fièvre alors ?       

           

CE QUI A ÉTÉ PRÉVU

L'équilibre de la flore intestinale     

L’intégrité des muqueuses digestives est étroitement liée au bon fonctionnement du cerveau            Les phases d’action du système immunitaire             

Le développement de notre système immunitaire         

Mieux comprendre le non-sens de la vaccination             

D’autres raisons pour ne pas interférer avec la nature 

L’importance des maladies infantiles   

La prévention et l’accompagnement naturels   

Le vieillissement     


SE FAVORISER UN TERRAIN PROPICE À LA SANTÉ    

Vivre d’amour et d’eau fraiche           

L’eau et l’impact de l’intention       

L’alimentation     

L’énergie vitale au centre de votre alimentation                 

L’alimentation vivante pour se sentir vivant             

Les prébiotiques et les lactofermentations       

Fruits et légumes     

Manger cru ou cuit ?     

Intégrer les plantes médicinales   

Tonifier le « feu » digestif         

Les noix, graines et légumineuses     

Le gluten est-il comestible ? 

Manger intuitivement   

Mangé végé ?           

Pour être fort comme un bœuf     

Notre physionomie est-elle végétarienne ?     

Remettre les protéines à leur place       

Équilibre acido-basique     

Les produits laitiers       

Alcaliniser son terrain               

Des plantes alcalines et nutritives en vedette         

Les aliments industriels, raffinées ou de synthèse

CULTIVER SON TERRAIN          

Engager une équipe de ménage et un personnel de soutient                 

Reconstruire le tube digestif       

Tonifier le foie       

Alléger l’alimentation de façon générale     

Un jeûne ?

Se laisser envahir par les mauvaises herbes 


AUTRES ASTUCES   

Vivre au naturel                                                                             

Aérer sa santé

VIVRE DE SA VRAIE NATURE

story_txt:
Living according to your true nature ; Guide to enjoy the pleasure of feeling good and healthy every day and forever. See english traduction in italics
EN GROS
Je suis accompagnante en matière de Santé et de Bien-être. J'ai une formation en herboristerie, en nutrition et une spécialisation en soins énergétiques intuitifs. En approfondissant personnellement dans ces directions, j'ai réalisé que plusieurs facteurs de santé méritaient à être revisités, ce qui m'a permis d'élaborer des outils simples et efficaces pour en venir à trouver l'équilibre et le confort dans notre vie de tous les jours. Ces dernières années, je me suis penchée sur les aspects plus essentiels de la vie, en expérimentant la maternité à travers l'accueil de mes deux  enfants, mais aussi en reconnectant avec ma vraie nature, cheminement qui m'a apporté plusieurs enseignements précieux.  
Je tiens à rédiger un ouvrage où je pourrai transmettre tout ce savoir qui m'habite de manière à ce que le plus de personnes possibles puissent en bénéficier et éventuellement jouir d'un état de bien-être et de santé supérieure, voir permanent. Mon intention première est d'offrir un ouvrage lumineux, imagé et coloré, bienveillant, agréable et inspirant où le lecteur sera amené à considérer les "solutions" plutôt que les aspects nocifs et dégradants de notre environnement dénaturé, tout en étant informé des facteurs de risques de nos habitudes modernes.
 
The project
I'm a catalyst of wealth and well-being. I have a background in herbalism, nutrition, and am an intuitive healer. Deepening in these directions, I realized that many health factors deserve to be revisited, which has allowed me to develop simples and effectives tools to maintain balance and comfort in our daily lives. In recent years, I have looked at the most essentials aspects of life, experiencing motherhood through the welcoming of my two children, but also reconnecting with my true nature, journey that has brought me many valuable lessons.
I want to write a book where I can pass on all the knowledge that live in me so that as many people as possible can benefit and possibly enjoy a state of well-being and greater health, see permanent. My first intention is to provide an illuminated book, colorful, pleasant and inspiring where I'll consider the "solutions" rather than harmful and degrading aspects of our unnatural environment, while being aware of factors risks of our modern habits.
Mon besoin en financement
Toute contribution financière à l'égard de cette merveilleuse ambition que je porte m'aidera à supporter à mon tour tous ceux qui participeront de leurs talents ou services à la naissance de ce livre (révision (1500$?), impression (4000$?!, graphisme (2000$?), promotion/ site internet monétisé (3000$?) et autres imprévus ou ambition (traduction vers l'anglais?). Comme vous pouvez le constater mon besoin dépasse largement les 5000$ demandés, mais étrangement, indiegogo prend seulement 4% du financement reçu si  nous atteignons notre objectif plutôt que 9% si nous ne l'atteignons pas. J'estime que, tout comme moi, il vous est plutôt préférable que votre financement bénéficie le plus possible au projet.
Merci infiniment, j'éprouve une extrême reconnaissance pour votre soutient et votre élan de générosité. Votre apport est extrêmement encourageant et me propulse vers la réalisation de mon projet.
Je tiens profondément à ce projet, c'est un peu un appel du coeur, un passage obligé. J'estime que l'être humain à le droit de jouir d'un bient-être profond et d'être sain de la tête au pied et je m'engage à mettre à sa portée tous les outils efficaces que je connais en la matière. Trop de gens souffrent d'un mal être profond ou d'une condition physique limitative alors qu'il pourrait en être autrement. J'offre des séances d'accompagnement desquels j'ai reçu beaucoup de commentaires positifs. 
 
My need for funding
Any financial contribution towards this wonderful ambition I have will help me to support at my turn all those involved for their talents and services to the birth of this book (review ($ 1500?), Printing ($ 4,000? !, graphics ($ 2000?) Promotion / website monetized ($ 3000?) and other unforeseen or ambition (translation into English?). As you can see my need well over $ 5,000 requested, but strangely, INDIEGOGO takes only 4% of the funding received if we reach our goal rather than 9% if we do not reach. I prefer that your financial support benefits as much as possible the project.
Thank you so much, I feel extreme gratitude for your support and your generosity. Your input is extremely encouraging and propuls me to my goal.
I am deeply attacht to this project, it is a bit of a calling, a must. I believe that the human being has the right to enjoy a deep wellbeing and be healthy from head to foot, and I am committed to share all effective tools that I know in this area. Too many people suffer from a deep malaise or a limiting physical condition when it could be otherwise. I offer coaching sessions where I received a lot of positive feedback.
 
LE PROJET DÉVOILÉ
Au fil du temps, j'ai réalisé que nous avions une idée limitée des facteurs responsables de la santé et que notre façon de gérer celle-ci n'amène pas les résultats espérés, justement parce qu'elle comporte certaines lacunes. Par exemple, au niveau scientifique, il semblerait que nous n'ayons pas encore eu le temps de faire une mise à jour par rapport à des donnés très probantes qui redéfinissent le rôle des micro-organismes si craints, l'importance de l'intégrité de nos muqueuses intestinales ou encore l'impact de nos habitudes de vie modernes, de notre alimentation dénaturée, des polluants environnementaux, pesticides, produits ménagers, etc. 
Et puis comme, à la base tout est énergie, j'aimerais aborder notre vitalité d'un point de vue énergétique en parlant de Taux vibratoire et de médecine quantique. Donc, dans cet ouvrage, à partir de mes connaissances en énergétique, médecine intuitive, nutrition, médecines naturelles et modernes, chinoise, ayurvédique, physique quantique, etc, j'aborderai sous un angle plus global (et marginal?) les principes fondamentaux de la Santé.
Voici une idée première des sujets abordés:  le respect de notre écosystème individuel, la nutrition, la maladie, le système immunitaire et son fonctionnement, les micro-organismes, la flore bactérienne, l'intégrité des muqueuses, Pasteur vs Béchamp, La tonification du terrain vs la vaccination, Les maladies émergentes débilitantes, les maladies infantiles, l'amour et la réalisation de Soi, vivre à partir de sa vraie nature, l'énergétique, le taux vibratoire, les blocages énergétiques, l'impact des pensées négatives et de la visualisation, les alternatives naturelles et la médecine moderne, la respiration, la tonification de son terrain et la purification saine de celui-ci, l'impact des polluants environnementaux et des métaux lourds, et bien davantage.
 
THE PROJECT REVEALED
Over time, I realized that we had a limited understanding of the factors responsibles for health and how we manage it does not bring the desired results, just because it has some shortcomings. For example, at a scientific level, it seems that we have not yet had time to do an update with respectfull data that redefine the role of micro-organisms so feared, the importance of integrity of our intestinal mucosa or the impact of our habits of this modern life, our unnatural diet, environmental pollutants, pesticides, household products, etc..
And as at the basis everything is energy, I would like to address our vitality from the point of view of energy talking vibratory rate and quantum medicine. So in this book, from my knowledge of energy, intuitive medicine, nutrition, natural and modern medicine, Chinese, Ayurvedic, quantum physics, etc., I will discuss in a more global perspective (and marginal?) The fundamental principles of Health.
Here is a first idea of the topics: respect for our individual ecosystem, nutrition, diseases, the immune system and its operation, microorganisms, bacterial flora, mucosal integrity, Pastor vs. Béchamp, The toning field vs. vaccination, debilitating emerging diseases, childhood diseases, love and self-realization, living from our true nature, energy, the vibratory rate, energy blockages, the impact of negative thinking and visualization, natural alternatives, modern medicine, breathing, toning his organism and healthy cleansing of it, the impact of environmental pollutants and heavy metals, and more.
 
LES À CÔTÉ
Le Guide Alimentaire Vivifiant

J'ai réalisé au printemps 2012 une Conférence-Gourmande en lien avec un Guide alimentaire Vivifiant (que j'ai moi-même conçu et que je souhaite distribuer à large échelle éventuellement), celui-ci est un résumé concis du type d'alimentation que nous devrions prôner, en accord avec notre nature, pour nous sentir Vibrants, Vivants, Vivifiés. Un petit tirage (50X) a été effectué de cette première version qui sera modifié de manière à être intégré avec mon Livre.
 
Les conférences
Je souhaite monter une série de conférences WEB en lien avec le livre. Pour l'instant, j'ai l'idée d'en monter 4 qui aborderaient les sujets suivants : 
* De l'intégrité des muqueuses (impact des irritants, gluten et produits laitiers)
* L'alimentation vivifiante (en lilen avec le Guide)
* Maladies, micro-organismes et système immunitaire
* Se purifier sainement et naturellement
 
Le CD et Le coffre à outil
Notez que les investisseurs de plus de 200$ recevront un CD tout spécialement conçu pour eux contenant toutes les conférences WEB réalisées en lien avec le livre. De plus, les "choyés" recevront un coffre à outil interactif et amusant, conçus à partir des donnés du livre.
 
 
 D'actualité
Je vous invites à parcourrir mon Blog pour mieux me connaître et découvrir mes approches : www.herboristesansfrontier.blogspot.com
 
REWARDS
*Please note that all the rewards will be translate in english only if I get enough foundind for it, so thankx for your generosity!!
The vitality Food Guide
I realized in spring 2012, a Gourmet conference in connection with the Vitality Food Guide (which I designed myself and I want to distribute on a large scale somehow), it is a concise summary of the type of food we should eat in accordance with our nature, to feel Vibrant, alive and energize. A small run (50X in french only) was made of the first version to be modified and integrated with my book.
 
conferences
I want to create a series of web conferences in connection with the book. For now, I have the ideas to go for 4 of them, that would address the following topics:
* at the basis of the mucosal integrity (impact of irritants, gluten, dairy products and much more)
* The invigorating diet 
* Diseases, micro-organisms and immune system
* Purify your organism in an healthy way
 
The CD and the tool box
Note that investors of more than $ 200 will receive a CD specially designed for them with all of the WEB conferences held in conjunction with the book. In addition, the "blessed" will receive a fun and interactive tool box, designed from the given book.
 
Here are the categories of the prices you could get
Horsd'oeuvre: 10$
You will receive by mail the Vitality Food Guide and your name will appear on my thank you page.
* Additional fees may be required if you live outside of Canada.** Delivery Date subject to change as the project
 
The projet : 30$
above + You will receive a printed autographed book. Note that the first printing of the book will be made on a small scale and numbered by hand.
* Additional fees may be required if you live outside of Canada.** Delivery Date subject to change as the project
 
The multimedia: 100$
above + 1 free web conferencing to choose from, in connection with the book (to come to my site) + 1 VIP invitation for two to the book launch
* Additional fees may be required if you live outside of Canada.** Delivery Date subject to change as the project
 
Le multimedia plus : 200$
above + free access to all web conferences via a CD.
** Delivery Date subject to change as the project
 
The accompanied : 300$
above + 1 session WEB support group (dates to be determined)
** Delivery Date subject to change as the project
 
The blessed : 500$
the aove + 1 tool box (limited number) in connection with the book + 1 copy of the first version of the Vitality Food Guide (in french only)
 
PREMIER ÉLAN D'ÉCRITURE - INTRODUCTION - 17 Juillet 2013
J'estime que l'être humain a le droit de jouir d'un bien-être profond et d'être sain de la tête au pied et qu’il est maintenant temps pour moi de mettre à votre portée tout le savoir que j’ai acquis pour y parvenir. Trop de gens souffrent d'un mal être profond ou d'une condition physique limitative alors qu'il pourrait en être autrement.  
Au fil du temps, j'ai réalisé que nous avions une idée limitée des facteurs responsables de la santé et que notre façon de gérer celle-ci n'amène pas les résultats espérés, justement parce que les approches, aussi diversifiées soient-elles, bien que la plupart bienveillantes, comportent certaines lacunes. Par exemple, la médecine conventionnelle semble adopter une approche rationnelle qui oublie trop souvent de considérer l’être humain de façon holistique, c’est-à-dire dans son ensemble. La science sur laquelle se fie la médecine moderne n’a pas le temps d’être publiquement mise à jour et donc nous n’en bénéficions pas du à sa juste valeur et bien souvent le savoir acquis qui réussi à se propager semble être biaisé par des intérêts corporatifs. Les approches rationnelles qui s’appuient sur des généralités soumettent l’organisme humain à des paramètres rigides alors que le corps est doté d’un pouvoir d’auto-régulation, voire d’auto-guérison surprenant et qu’il est, somme toute, impermanent, régis par des lois intangibles surprenantes révélant bien souvent du miraculeux, lesquels miracles ne sont pas pris en considération. Les approches corps-esprit, qui reconnaissent l’impact de l’esprit sur l’harmonie du corps physique, comportent elles aussi leur lacunes, ne serait-ce qu’en nourrissant un sentiment de culpabilité chez l’être malade en axant sur la responsabilité de son vécu, ce qui a pour effet généralement d’amplifier le mal-être. Toutes ses approches pourtant ont ceci en commun, c’est qu’elles cherchent réellement à améliorer les conditions de santé et physiques de ceux qui en ont besoin, leur approche est généralement bienveillante, au mieux de leurs capacités et connaissances. Je ne prétendrai pas non plus détenir La Solution idéale, mais je sens que je suis parvenue à créer pour moi une médecine efficace et globale et je tiens à vous partager mes connaissances et apprentissages en la matière. 
Mon intérêt personnel envers l’art de la guérison et d’accompagner les gens vers un état de mieux-être m’a amené à approfondir mes connaissances au sein de la médecine quantique, du cheminement personnel, de l’énergétique et de ma connexion intuitive. J’ai alors constaté que bien que plusieurs concepts portent un nom différent, selon l’auteur, il y a des éléments de bases qui reviennent et qui pourraient entre-autre être qualifiées de vérités supérieures (à ne pas confondre avec absolues). J’ai entre-autre découvert que bonheur et santé allaient de pair et qu’il suffisait de jouir d’un état supérieur de bonheur, voire permanent, pour que notre état de santé retrouve son optimal, peu importe notre âge ou notre condition physique. Comment est-ce possible ? Ou encore comment jouir d’un état de bonheur permanent ? Et bien c’est cela que je vais tenter de démystifier avec vous au travers des pages suivantes. 
 

14 août - Voici la structure de ce qui a été réalisé jusqu'à maintenant au niveau de l'écriture

story:
Short Summary

I am Olaniyi John Gbolahan, I am an Architect and an Interior Designer, a non-financial member of the International Interior Design Association (IIDA) and President of the African Association of Interior Designers (AAID www.aaidesign.org), I have a strong passion for empowering others particularly young people and I have used every resource I can to create platforms to help empower youths and reduce poverty in Africa.

That passion led me to found a vocation skill school in 2008 to teach Interior decoration and design (please visit the following links: www.mavensidd.com  www.facebook.com/mavensidd )and today we have further through a sister school created new courses to include make up artistry, bead making and wire works, photography etc we have through partnerships been able to have small training centres in more than 5 locations across Nigeria and we have started working towards opening training centres in Ghana and Sierra Leone and the Gambia etc

Since inception nothing has been more important to us than seeing jobless youths get vocation skills that will help them become self reliant and employers of labour, it just always brings me so much joy, the level of poverty in Africa is unbelievably high- in a country like mine where corruption is record high, poverty levels amid vast natural resources is painful, the minimum basic income is 100usd per month and only a few can get jobs, the very high level of youth unemployment has plunged the country into scary levels of insecurity as youths now find very negative ways of surviving- social ills stemming from unemployment are worsening by the day.

There are not too many people doing much about empowering youths but we have made up our minds that we will do all in our power to give young people the power to make the world better, when they can earn income and make money then they will help others also, the task is daunting as one of every 4 African is a Nigerian but we are more than ready to continue to help reduce unemployment; since inception we have trained 1840 students across Nigeria, 70% of that number have gone to starting their own businesses, 25% have found employment in firms and companies that require their new skills and every month we continue to produce employers of labour but we know we need to do more. Our graduates earn an average of 950usd monthly and some even more!

Lack of basic infrastructure makes it very expensive indeed to run a business in Nigeria, as I write this, our school and offices are powered by a petrol power generating set, we have been on the generator for about 5 hours now and we will likely do so till close of day, we have to buy expensive petrol daily; the high cost of running the school ensures that we cannot subsidize fees to a cost everybody can afford, we need to bring cost down from 468usd (other schools who teach the same curriculum charge 6250usd); we already give at least 3 full scholarships every month and we need to do much more; we can only teach 10 students at a time but if we had a larger space we will take more unemployed youths and be more sustainable, at the moment we are barely able to survive, every cash made is re-invested into the school to keep it afloat and keep helping people; with your contributions we can help put smiles on the faces of many thousands!

The country has 36 states and we have been able through strategic partnerships to open small centers in only 8 states, the high cost of maintaining the campuses at a reduced tuition that many still cannot afford has turned 5 of the centers into under performers, with your contribution we can turn that around, we will get bigger spaces and train more young people, we will be able to give out more scholarships, we will open more centers across the Country and move ahead to open at least one center in Ghana; our goal is to be sustainable and your kind contribution can help us achieve that, we can take youths of crime and social ills, we can help reduce insecurity and even terrorism by giving youths a means to earn, we must all work together to break the vicious cycle of poverty and its very ravaging ill effects.

Increased funding will ensure we can publicize more, get bigger spaces with adequate infrastructure and training equipment, we can now have a much needed workshop and afford to employ more professionals, with more training centers and more students we can have sustainable growth and do so much more!

We need you!


What We Need & What You Get

Class 1

Class 2


As you can see from the pictures above our training classes are quite small and we can only teach about 10 students per class, we have only 2 classes and we do not have a much needed workshop; power supply is far from constant in the Country and we do need a very good power generating set, we need a bigger library and more equipped library and funds to get teaching aids, material samples and afford to pay more experienced facilitators and of course we need a much bigger space.

Please find below a detailed breakdown:

3 year lease for a bigger training facility- $18750

Fully equipped Training workshop (to show students how to install physical building elements)- $28125

Teaching Aids and Equipment in 10 locations across the Country- $37,500

Power generating set (Diesel engine)- $9375

Nationwide Publicity and Marketing- $12,500

Total:  $106250

Amount to be put down by us:  $21250

Total amount needed: $85000

Increased funding will ensure we can give more indigent students full and partial scholarships, we currently give at least one student a scholarship in every class of 10, a larger class size will ensure helping more students will be sustainable.

Though we sincerely hope and believe you are just as passionate as we are in ensuring that we make our world a better place by reducing poverty and unemployment and would help us surpass our fund raising goals but if we do not reach our funding goal we will use the funds raised to get a larger training facility so we can empower more youths and be more sustainable as a business.

Picture above showing students out on Practicals

Picture above showing students out on Practicals


Pictures above showing our students out on excursion 



PERKS....yaaaaaaay!!!


We cannot begin to tell you how much we appreciate your supporting our vision and helping us reduce poverty in Africa; we appreciate your immense support and though we cannot thank you enough we have some exciting perks for you:

10USD

I JUST WANNA HELP

If you would like to help us reduce poverty by giving vocation skills to young adults we did be eternally grateful and feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts not shown

25USD

We will show you how so much we appreciate you with a beautiful e-card sent to you via email and feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts not shown

50USD

Get our heartfelt gratitude felt through a personal email, a beautiful thank you e-card and lectures notes on Color Psychology and also feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts not shown

100USD

We appreciate you immensely and we will more than show it with personal email, a beautiful thank you e-card and lectures notes on Color Psychology and Design psychology to help you understand how colour and design influence people in an interior space. We will also feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts won’t be shown.

250USD

Whao! We are jumping for joy and your generosity and to let you see how grateful we are, we will send you a personal thank you email, a beautiful thank you e-card and our full interior design and decoration lecture notes so you can design your own space even better! We will also feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts won’t be shown.

500 USD

Gushhhh....we are livid with unbelievable excitement at your generosity, we cannot begin to thank you enough but we will definite show how much we love and appreciate your kindness with an audio thank you note sent via email from our Public Relations Officer Miss Tokunbo Sotuminu, we will also send you a personal thank you email, a beautiful thank you e-card and our full interior design and decoration lecture notes so you can design your own space even better! We will also feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts won’t be shown.

1000 USD

Hummm...hummmm...we are speechless! Like totally speechlesssssssss! Thank you so very much, you have given the equivalent of a full scholarship to 2 jobless young individuals and you have made it to our Hall of Greatness and we will list your name on the wall of the school reception, you will also receive via email an audio thank you note from our Public Relations Officer Miss Tokunbo Sotuminu, we will also send you a personal thank you email, a beautiful thank you e-card and our full interior design and decoration lecture notes so you can design your own space even better! We will also feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts won’t be shown.

5000USD

Aaaahhhhhhhhhh! How on earth are we ever going to say thank you....we are livid, totally flabbergasted....please if you don’t mind we need to scream again: Aaaaahhhhhhhhhhhh!! Thank you so much, you have given the equivalent of about 10 young unemployed people a full scholarship, we will name a merit student award after you and yes! you have also made it to our Hall of Greatness and we will list your name on the wall of the school reception, you will also receive via email an audio thank you note from our Chief Executive Officer Architect Olaniyi Gbolahan, we will also send you a personal thank you email, a beautiful thank you e-card and our full interior design and decoration lecture notes so you can design your own space even better! We will also feature you on our website contributors’ page if you won’t mind and amounts won’t be shown.


All pictures below are design projects by student at our School:



Work by students 

We want you to know your kind contributions will help us take many thousands away poverty, they will be self sufficient and financially independent and become employers of labor, they will in-turn be able to empower other members of their family, your contributions will be helping us to indirectly reduce the social ills that emanate from poverty and lack: insecurity, robbery, violence etc and we cannot say thank you enough for that!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute you are so very special as well, we know you are just as passionate as we are to ensure we all help to reduce poverty in the world; we will so appreciate it if you would help to spread the word, tell your friends, family and your network about our wonderful plan to continue to get young Africans off the street and away from poverty and you can use Indiegogo share tools to do that as well. You are a world changer! We love and appreciate you!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Mindy LaVergne and I was born raise in Queens, New York. In my family food equaled love and because my family was so loving - I became obese at a very young age. At my peak I was 275 lbs. Growing up "the nerdy fat kid" I had no sense what it meant to be healthy and physically active. Over the years dieting turned into supplement abuse and desperation sent me spiraling into an eating disorder that nearly killed me.

It took a long time, a lot of research, self-motivation, and willpower to bring out the healthy happy woman I am today.

I want to take my experience and get the education I need to help others like me become the amazing people I know everyone can be. 

This is something I've always wanted to do but because of the high cost it had remained a pipe dream.

It wasn't until this past January when I was laid off from my job as a television news producer that I decided it was time to follow my real passion.

This campaign is to raise enough money for me to attend the Focus Personal Training Institute - New York's leading facility for those looking to enter the fitness industry.

Please know that I have looked into all avenues of funding (i.e. loans and payment plans), but I am not eligible. 

I have and always been a big supporter of people's projects and dreams.

Now I can only hope that karma really exists.

What We Need & What You Get

I need approximately $18,550 to make this happen.
Here is the cost breakdown:
- Training Courses: $10,500
- Textbooks and training supplies: $898
- Registration, COL, ACE exam & campaign fees: $7,150
Here are the unique perks I can offer for your donations:

$25: A weekly Mindy Maven fit email, which will contain personal updates, health news, health facts/tips, recipes and workout inspiration.

$50 & up: A limited edition motivational 3-D print.

$100 & up: A fitness assessment, custom virtual fitness plan, and training video. This also includes a chance to be included in a focus survey and have a featured review of the Mindy Method.

$500 & up: All of the aforementioned items plus a total virtual coaching plan* for 3 weeks.

Virtual Coaching includes a custom plan that creates personal access to me and utilizes various digital, possible face-to-face, online, and mobile tools to create a fitness plan that not only works but keeps you motivated in the world you live in today.
What happens if I do not reach my goal:
No matter what all the money raised will go toward my education at the Focus Training Institute. I will reach my goal by any means necessary!

The Impact

I have a reputation for advocating fitness and living a healthy lifestyle. I also have a solid track record for helping and encouraging other to reach their fitness goals. 
I am different because I want to get the right education so I can develop a fitness methodology and program that is effective, accessible, realistic, drug-free, non-restrictive, affordable and DIGITAL (because that is how we live our lives).
I can and will become a personal trainer and wellness coach because I don't want anyone to go through what I had. I want to be an health advocate, a fitness cheerleader and life resource for people who want to become a better version of themselves.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out, share, and make some noise about my campaign!

story:
My Story

Greetings!  My name is Michael Carr and I'm a 22 year-old from Alexandria, Virginia.  I am currently a Teach for America (TFA) corps member in the Hawaii region teaching in an underfunded and poorly resourced school district.  I teach 8th grade math and science for special education students who present a wide array of unique challenges and needs to be met.  I graduated from Virginia Commonwealth University (VCU) as an honors student with a B.S. in Economics and a minor in Political Science.  I am currently getting my Masters Degree in Secondary Education from Johns Hopkins University.  As a result of all my experiences, both good and bad, I feel that there is a dire need to attract talent and passion into socially beneficial economic sectors.  I fundamentally believe that to perpetuate social innovation in our society, we need the best and brightest in socioeconomic fields.  George Mason University is a leader in educating up and coming social entrepreneurs.  This is a fairly new field of study with plenty left to explore, and may have the answers to some of society's most pressing problems.

  

What is a social entrepreneur, you ask?  

Simply put, it is an individual who has dedicated his/her life to starting enterprises for the good of all people.  Notable social entrepreneurs include Sal Khan of The Khan Academy, Blake Mycoskie of TOMS shoes, Richard Saul Wurman of Ted Talks, and Wendy Kopp of Teach for America. These people are fundamentally improving the way we interact with the world.  One day, with your support, I will have the opportunity to be amongst their ranks.

What I Need

Tuition for Program -$2000

Includes:

  • Academic Component: Attending classes from prominent social entrepreneurs
  • Experiential Component: Consulting for local non-profit organizations
  • Competition Component: Participating in the Lean Start-Up competition where groups of students pitch business idea to a panel of experts.

*All funds I receive, whether I reach the goal or not, will go to paying for my tuition for the Social Entrepreneurship Program.

The Impact

This program will serve as spring board for my career in social entrepreneurship.  The Social Innovation Program (SIP) is one of the few geared toward social innovation and has made a significant impact in its first 8 years.  SIP graduates emerge able to successfully apply entrepreneurial approaches to social causes in the nonprofit, public, and private sectors.  

What makes SOCIAL entrepreneurs different?

While entrepreneurs typically bring a new product to the market for the purpose of generating income, social entrepreneurs establish new ventures to generate social value.  Social Entrepreneurship has the potential to impact academics, policy, economics, and just about any cause one can think of.  Everyone can benefit from social innovation, but more importantly, it is up to us to be the catalyst.

The Success of the Program:

The Social Innovation Program (SIP) has hosted 176 graduates from over 50 Universities.  Students report that their knowledge and sense of efficacy in key competency measures increased an average of between 33% and 230%. SIP has delivered a total of 162 projects to agencies and social enterprises. Partners rated the projects at an average of 9 out of 10 for their impact on the partners’ capacity to respond to social challenges using entrepreneurial practices.  17 social enterprise initiatives begun at students’ home universities.  85% of graduates indicate they are involved or plan to be involved in careers as social entrepreneurs.

What I plan to DO:

Changing the world, one school system at a time.  I will use the skills that I acquire from the Social Innovation Program to make a lasting impact on education and education policy. I will design innovative solutions to address a number of issues plaguing our education system including: poor resource distribution, growing learning gaps for students with special needs, and the lack of safe and constructive after school programs for students in inner cities.   There is a severe opportunity gap in education between wealthy and not-so-wealthy people.  My vision is to provide access to resources and opportunities to the students of families in need.  The future of our world depends on the education of our children.

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate your support in ANY way you can give it, whether that be money, word of mouth, words of encouragement, or any of the other countless ways to show support. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools and share me on Facebook and Twitter.  Thank you all so much!

Experiential Component: Consulting for local
     non-profit organizations
Competition Component: Participating in the Lean Start-Up competition where groups of students pitch business idea to a panel of experts.
*All funds I receive,
whether I reach the goal or not, will go to paying for my tuition for the
Social Entrepreneurship Program.
The Impact
This program will serve as spring board for my career in social entrepreneurship.  The Social Innovation Program (SIP) is one of
the few geared toward social innovation and has made a significant impact
in its first 8 years.  SIP graduates emerge able to
successfully apply entrepreneurial approaches to social causes in the
nonprofit, public, and private sectors.  
What makes SOCIAL
entrepreneurs different?
While entrepreneurs
typically bring a new product to the market for the purpose of generating
income, social entrepreneurs establish new ventures to generate social value.  Social Entrepreneurship has the potential to impact academics, policy, economics, and just about any cause one can think of. 
Everyone can benefit from social innovation, but more importantly, it is up to
us to be the catalyst.
The Success of the Program:
The Social Innovation
Program (SIP) has hosted 176 graduates from over 50
Universities.  Students report that their knowledge and sense of
efficacy in key competency measures increased an average of between 33%
and 230%. SIP has delivered a total of 162 projects to agencies and social enterprises. Partners rated the projects at an average of 9 out of 10 for their impact on the
partners’ capacity to respond to social challenges using entrepreneurial
practices.  17 social enterprise initiatives begun
at students’ home universities.  85% of graduates indicate
they are involved or plan to be involved in careers as
social entrepreneurs.
What I plan to DO:
Changing the world, one
school system at a time.  I
will use the skills that I acquire from the Social Innovation Program to make a
lasting impact on education and education policy. I will
design innovative solutions to address a number of issues plaguing our
education system including: poor resource distribution, growing learning gaps for students with special needs, and the lack of
safe and constructive after school programs for students in inner cities.   There is a severe opportunity
gap in education between wealthy and not-so-wealthy people.  My vision is to provide access to resources and
opportunities to the students of families in need.  The future of our world depends on the
education of our children.
Other Ways You Can Help
I appreciate your support in ANY way
you can give it, whether that be money, word of mouth, words of
encouragement, or any of the other countless ways to show support. Don't
forget to use the Indiegogo share tools and share me on Facebook and Twitter.
 Thank you all so much!

story:
Every Child Deserves A Family.  Statistics of children in the United States living without families show that 90% will experience some type of mental illness, and 40% will eventually turn to crime.  In other countries, children who are not adopted within a specific time frame are often put out into the world to fend for themselves.  These vulnerable youth can die of exposure and malnourishment.  They can end up victims of the street, or worse, casualties of horrific crimes such as sex-trafficking or child sacrifice.  Salvation International Adoption Charity dreams of a day when all children are safe.  Our vision is that there is no longer a need for foster homes or orphanages and every child is wrapped in the unconditional love of a forever family. Please join our effort to raise $140,000 by June 15 to assist 28 eligible couples and individuals adopt children from the United States, Bulgaria, China, Columbia, Honduras, Nicaragua, Philippines, Uganda, and Ukraine. 100% of the monies raised by Salvation International Adoption Charity is used to help build families through adoption.

 Founded in 2012 by DANIELLE FLEÉNOR, who also serves as Executive Director, the evolution of Salvation International Adoption Charity is literally a labor of love.  Danielle said, "A few years back, my husband and I looked into adopting a baby from China.  Realizing it cost $30,000, and we just didn't have $30,000 at the time, I ended up thinking if it was hard for me to find that kind of money, it must be hard for others too.  I thought, I could start a clothing line and the money I raised I will just give away.  And that is how Salvation International began.”

Bringing together a group of friends including ARLENE BELL, Director of Donations, Marketing and Event Coordination, SANDY KORDICK, Director of Fundraising & Volunteer Coordinator, and STACY DEMPSEY, Director of Communications, Danielle worked with her team to create a series of fund raising events.  Fund raisers over the past two and half years have included rummage sales, comedy nights, fashion shows, walks, restaurant lunches and dinners, winery events, sporting events including "Batting for Babies," and concerts.  The $33,250 dollars raised to date has been donated to 17 families, adopting children from 8 countries including the United States, China, Ethiopia, Ghana, Latvia, Republic of Congo, South Africa, and Uganda.

 One poignant adoption story involves 4 children from Ghana.  A loving United States family learned that they would be able to adopt from Ghana and keep a sibling group of three together.  This same US family also learned of an unrelated abandoned little girl on whom they could not turn their backs.  The little girl was 2 years and 8 months old.  She weighed 26.4 pounds.  She was born blind, with cerebral palsy and suffered from a female genital mutilation that went horribly wrong and needed medical attention.  She was unable to sit independently, was non-verbal and unable to crawl.  Her name was Eve.  In Ghana, as well as other parts of the world, children with special needs rarely have access to medical care, are not educated and are frequently abandoned on the streets.  Little Eve lived in a large government orphanage, confined to a crib, and her future did not look promising.  Thanks to grant assistance from Salvation International, the sibling trio and Eve now have medical care, will be educated, and live with a family that loves them unconditionally.

 Another adoption story involves two babies named Hope.  The first baby was born in the United States.  When the adoptive parents received their new baby, they gave her the special name of Hope. They enjoyed five days with their new daughter Hope before her birth mother changed her mind and took the baby back for an older cousin to help raise instead.  When the US door closed for these adoptive parents, another one opened in Uganda, Africa.  A child born with extreme developmental delays awaited.  The adoptive parents were unsure if they would be the right family for the child, but then, after reading the baby's file, they discovered her name meant Hope in Ugandan and adopted her.

 Grants range from $500 to $5000.00 per family depending on individual situations and funds available by this charitable organization.  All monies awarded by Salvation International are given directly to the adoption agency handling the family's adoption.  Grants are provided to assist adopting families with adoption agency fees and expenses such as medical costs for the adoptive children, travel expenses.  Myriads of other adoption-related costs can be daunting to prospective adopting parents seeking to provide quality home environments for children.  Grants are awarded on a case by case review, but contingent upon completed home studies.

 Salvation International awards grants twice a year in June and December.  April 1 is the deadline for June applications. October 1 is the December grant cycle deadline.  Families may apply once in an annual cycle and must be in the adoption process at the time of application.  Applicants must be US citizens residing in the United States.  Applicants must be able to demonstrate that they can provide stable home environments for the children, but significant financial obstacles stand in the way of completing the adoption process.

 Salvation International grants may be used for domestic or international, private or agency adoptions.

For more information on the granting process please visit www.salvationinternational.org


BOARD OF DIRECTORS

Danielle Fleénor - Founder & Executive Director


HOW DID SALVATION INTERNATIONAL BEGIN?

“A few years back, my husband and I looked into adopting a baby from China…realizing it cost $30,000, we just didn’t have it…I ended up thinking if it was hard for me to find that kind of money, it must be hard for others too.  I thought I could start a clothing line and the money I raise I will just give away…and that is where Salvation International began.” – Danielle, Founder & President.

WHAT IS OUR MISSION AND VISION?

Salvation International wants to facilitate and expedite a better life for all children waiting to be adopted.  Our mission is to provide grants to qualified couples and individuals towards their adoption expenses of domestic and international adoptions.  It seems ironic that children wait to be adopted while potential parents struggle to afford the costs of adoption. Our vision is that every child deserves a family.


ARLENE BELL~ 


Director of Donations and Marketing / Event Coordinator
I grew up in the time of Punky Brewster, Webster, and Diff’rent Strokes. I fell in love with the idea of adoption and promised myself as a young girl that I was never going to have biological kids of my own. I also promised myself I would never get married and I would join the Peace Corps after college but as my idealist self gave away to reality, I got married, never joined the Peace Corps and had three biological children of my own.I am excited and motivated to help fulfill Salvation International’s vision that EVERY CHILD DESERVES A FAMILY. Each child that we help adopt is a gift to the young girl I was. Salvation International has given me a wonderful opportunity to achieve my dream through these special children and their families!

SANDY KORDICK ~ 


Director of Fundraising & Volunteer CoordinatorI was invited to be a board member for Salvation International in 2012.  I accepted because Jason and Danielle Fleenor have a dream to help as many orphaned children find their forever families as they can.  I have never met two people that have such passion for this cause.  There is a need and it becomes greater and greater each day passing.  I strongly believe in helping those in need.  Every child deserves a family. There are so many men and women willing and wanting to complete their families, Salvation International is here to ease some of the financial burden incurred by adoption.  I wanted and needed to be a part of completing families. I have two beautiful biological children and I cannot imagine my life without them.  Being able to help provide the same happiness and completion to other families is rewarding beyond measure.

STACY DEMPSEY ~ 


Director of Communications I am a big believer that people come into our lives for a reason, and that each person should be the change they want to see in the world. I can’t say that my life was particularly touched by adoption. That truth shifted when I met Danielle & Jason Fleenor, through our sons. The friendship we formed was instant & genuine. 

After attending several Salvation fundraising events, I was moved by the Fleenor's generosity, and impressed that they saw a need in our world, came up with a plan to make a difference, and put it into action. I became familiar with some of the families Salvation International had helped and their heart-warming stories. It was an honor when Jason and Danielle asked me to join their efforts.  Through this experience, it has been privileged to work alongside some of the most talented, selfless, inspirational people you could ever meet. In doing so, I have been a part of bringing families together, and as a mother of three (biological) children, THAT makes my heart sing! 

I am overwhelmed with gratitude because Danielle, Jason, and Salvation came into my life, allowing me to be a part of making this world a better place by building families through adoption.
